name: Conviction Countermeasure
text:
Target a friendly squad.

Affected models gain +1 DEF. While within 1" of a permanent objective, affected models can reroll their defense rolls. A defense roll can be rerolled once as a result of Conviction Countermeasure.

Conviction Countermeasure expires at the end of the Pulse round.
changes: Replace "While securing an objective." to "While within 1" of a permanent objective.".
